title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 29.1 - Persons eligible
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 29.1 - Persons eligible

State Regulations
A permit will be issued only to an on-premises liquor, wine or beer licensee who is furnishing provisions and service for use at a
particular function, occasion or event. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
29.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
